metadata.title: CVE-2019-12497 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through 7.0.8, Community Edition 6.0.x through 6.0.19, and Community Edition 5.0.x through 5.0.36. In the customer or external frontend, personal information of agents (e.g., Name and mail address) can be disclosed in external notes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-12497` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.19-1
otrs2 - 6.0.19-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.19-1').
